abstract: Hundreds gather at World Trade Center site in Manhattan to read list of names of victims of September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks; crowd is noticeably smaller than in years past.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds gathered on Friday, a smaller turnout than in years past, for what has become an annual rite of remembrance — a reading of the victims’ names.

headline.main: On 9/11 Anniversary, a Small and Somber Ritual in Lower Manhattan
headline.print_headline: A Small and Somber Ceremony at the 9/11 Memorial

snippet: Hundreds gathered on Friday, a smaller turnout than in years past, for what has become an annual rite of remembrance — a reading of the victims’ names.
